summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 FORD FUSION. AFTER EXITING THE VEHICLE AND PLACING THE GEAR SHIFTER INTO PARK, THE VEHICLE ROLLED FORWARD. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO LONGMONT FORD (LOCATED AT 235 ALPINE ST, LONGMONT, CO 80501, (720) 771-6003), BUT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED. THE VEHICLE WAS THEN TOWED TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO DIAGNOSED THAT THE SHIFTER CABLE DETACHED FROM THE GEAR SHIFTER LEVER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 19V362000 (POWER TRAIN). THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 90,000.
